original_text: Then God will be kind to that person. God will say, “Save that person, so that he does not go to his grave. I have found someone to pay the price for his life. So keep him alive.” Then God will be kind to that person. God will say, “Save that person, so that he does not go to his grave. I have found someone to pay the price for his life. So keep him alive.” Then God will be kind to that person. God will say, “Save that person, so that he does not go to his grave. I have found someone to pay the price for his life. So keep him alive.” Then God will be kind to that person.
korean_text: 하나님이 그 사람을 불쌍히 여기사 그를 건져서 구덩이에 내려가지 않게 하라 내가 대속물을 얻었다 하시리라

sentences.original_text: Then God will be kind to that person.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님은 그 사람에게 친절하실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: so that he does not go to his grave
I have found someone to pay the price for his life
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그의 생명값을 치를 사람을 찾았다

sentences.original_text: Then God will be kind to that person.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님은 그 사람에게 친절하실 것이다.
